ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess and other lutes.
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah right.  The high level bard in S Karana is always camped because his AI is so bad he is pathetic.  I watched him being killed by two Necros and he never
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah right. The high level bard in S Karana is always camped because his AI
is so bad he is pathetic. I watched him being killed by two Necros and he
never once actually played a song. I'm beginning to wonder if he even is a
bard, though judging from his melee incompetence he must be.

Kitasi

From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> p.s.s. is it just me or how come Verant has such a low opinion of bards?
> They design dungeons and populate them with these mobs: knights, warriors,
> shamen, wizards, enchanters, etc. so where do they put the bards? Hello
a
> Sylly are you [interested] in helping deliver some [mail]?

Oh man, can you imagine? Some crazy NPC bard.. hehe.

a froglok bard releases a great bellow.
You feel every bone in your body rattle.

that would be hilarious.

Harmonic.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
